name: webapp-starter
description: A Full Stack Web Application Starter with Node, Express, Webpack, React, Scss and TypeScript.
author: cannahum@outlook.com

scripts.setup: concurrently "npm i" "npm i --prefix app/server" "npm i --prefix app/client"
scripts.setup:clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm i && concurrently "npm run --prefix app/server setup:clean" "npm run --prefix app/client setup:clean"
